actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 404(b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1968 to provide that no physically handicapped individual shall be denied air transportation solely because of such physical handicap.

summary.text: Provides that, subject to reasonable rules and regulations prescribed by the Civil Aeronautics Board, no physically handicapped individual shall be denied air transportation solely because of such physical handicap.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 404(b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1968 to provide that no physically handicapped individual shall be denied air transportation solely because of such physical handicap.
